block.p: BRENNGLASS-Theresa. The Orthodox Union mourns the passing of Theresa (Terry) Brennglass, beloved wife of Samuel L. Brennglass, our esteemed Honorary Chairman of the Board. Terry nurtured a legacy of devotion to family and community. May the family be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Mandell I. Ganchrow, M.D., President Rabbi Raphael B. Butler, Executive Vice-President
